tweet.text: PUBLIC PRESENTATION Sept. 12, 2022 at 10am EDT At the #HAC meeting, attend Chris Tudda’s presentation on the Carter administration’s policy on arms control and non-proliferation To register for this free online event, please send an email to FortJL@state.gov (1/2) https://t.co/bib8bIAI0M
